name: ProcessSubmitRequest

methods.name: getObjectId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the record that has been submitted for approval. For example, it can return an account, contact, or custom object record.
Returns the developer name or ID of the process definition.
If getProcessDefinitionNameOrId() returns a value other than null, getSkipEntryCriteria() determines whether to evaluate the entry criteria for the process (true) or not (false).

methods.name: getSubmitterId
methods.description: Returns the user ID of the submitter requesting the approval record. The user must be one of the allowed submitters in the process definition setup.

methods.name: setObjectId
methods.description: Sets the ID of the record to be submitted for approval. For example, it can specify an account, contact, or custom object record.

methods.name: setProcessDefinitionNameOrId
methods.description: Sets the developer name or ID of the process definition to be evaluated.

methods.name: setSkipEntryCriteria
methods.description: If the process definition name or ID is not null, setSkipEntryCriteria() determines whether to evaluate the entry criteria for the process (true) or not (false).

methods.name: setSubmitterId
methods.description: Sets the user ID of the submitter requesting the approval record. The user must be one of the allowed submitters in the process definition setup. If you donâ€™t set a submitter ID, the process uses the current user as the submitter.
